thread.title: GREAT HOTEL
thread.title_full: GREAT HOTEL - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ilan689
title: GREAT HOTEL
text: This was my first visit in nadler soho hotel.and i am sure that it is just the start ,i will come again and again. Everything in the hotel great : the location,the room is beautiful,clean and comfortable,the staff were friendly,kindly and helpful. I would like to note some who i remember, alberto,jesica,noemi. thanks for all.
